-Total forest cover -7,12,249 sq km (21.67%)

-Total Forest & Tree cover is 8,07,276 sq km (24.56%)

My head
holds echoes of rivers
thoughts flowing mercurial
from one islet to another
mental water
feeding the roots
of mangrove forest consciousness
a fragile ecosystem
underlying the structures of my belief
the roots go deep
fastening the river-echo into place
so it never drifts.
